doc:
Madeline and Marion Fairbanks https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Madeline_and_Marion_Fairbanks 0 Madeline (Madeleine) (15 November 1900 – 15 January 1989) and her twin sister Marion Fairbanks (15 November 1900 – 20 September 1973) were stage and motion picture actresses active in the silent era. The two sisters were seemingly inseparable. However, their Thanhouser filmographies are slightly different, as on occasion one twin appeared in a film without the other. Madeline ( Madeleine ) ( 15_November_1900 – 15_January_1989 ) and her_twin_sister_Marion_Fairbanks ( 15_November_1900 – 20_September_1973 ) were_stage_and_motion_picture_actresses active in the_silent_era . The_two_sisters were seemingly_inseparable . However , their_Thanhouser_filmographies are slightly_different , as on occasion_one_twin appeared in a_film without the_other .
